question: Would a sleep study diagnose stress?
question_content: I think that I am more stressed than really having a sleeping problem. It can take meup to all night to get to sleep but once I'm asleep, I can sleep the whole day away. I'm going to see a Sleep Specialist, for lack of a better doctor-type name, this month but would they be able to diagnose stress or would they just say that nothing is wrong with me.

answers.answer_content: YES they would be able to .. and any thing else that is interfering with your sleep ... sometimes our brain is just so full of thoughts that we don't know how to turn it off and relax but I think a nice cool shower or bath every night before you go to sleep may help you .... and if you like tea or warm milk it will relax you even more and allow your brain to unwind and rest be-careful of too much stress that can cause health problems in the future .... check in with a doctor and get all the facts or go on-line and look up stress and sleeping disorder .... and you will find what your looking for....
